Sentencas: A stack of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) can be used as an automotive catalytic converter for lean-burn NO emission control.
Titulo: Lean-burn NOx emission control via simulated stack of solid oxide fuel cells with Cu-added (LaSr)MnO3 cathodes

Sentencas: With a simulated SOFC stack, it is demonstrated that this converter can reduce NO in the lean-burn engine exhaust to zero no matter how large the inlet NOx concentration is.
Titulo: Lean-burn NOx emission control via simulated stack of solid oxide fuel cells with Cu-added (LaSr)MnO3 cathodes

Sentencas: An SOFC unit operating at 600 C was constructed with Ni-YSZ as the anode, YSZ as the electrolyte, and Cu-added La0.3Sr0.2MnO3-Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 as the cathode.
Titulo: Lean-burn NOx emission control via simulated stack of solid oxide fuel cells with Cu-added (LaSr)MnO3 cathodes

Sentencas: The NOx conversion increases not only with decreasing NO concentration in the low NO concentration range but also with increasing NO concentration in the high NO concentration range.
Titulo: Lean-burn NOx emission control via simulated stack of solid oxide fuel cells with Cu-added (LaSr)MnO3 cathodes

Sentencas: In addition, the NO conversion increases with increasing O-2 concentration and can increase with adding SO2.
Titulo: Lean-burn NOx emission control via simulated stack of solid oxide fuel cells with Cu-added (LaSr)MnO3 cathodes

Sentencas: Simultaneous control of CO emission via oxidation can be performed in this converter.
Titulo: Lean-burn NOx emission control via simulated stack of solid oxide fuel cells with Cu-added (LaSr)MnO3 cathodes
Lean-burn NOx emission control via simulated stack of solid oxide fuel cells with Cu-added (LaSr)MnO3 cathodes
